name: Mix Hentai Girls
description:
There is no meaning of life without waifus, Mix Hentai Girls is a game to elevate you mood in the best way, with hentai, girls and relaxing music.

Game features:

  • Cute kawaii girls
  • Lo-Fi music
  • Adult mode
  • Gallery
  • Panic button
  • Achievements
  • Cloud saving
  • NSFW
  • Can be played with one hand ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

We are working hard now to provide workshop support and PvP/Battle royale mode.
